columnDefinition.name: WixUnitTest
columnDefinition.description: The unique key for the unit test.

columnDefinition.name: CustomAction_
columnDefinition.description: The unique key for the unit test.

columnDefinition.name: Operator
columnDefinition.description: The operator to be applied to the property (0=equal, 1=not-equal).

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The to be tested against the property.

columnDefinition.name: Expression
columnDefinition.description: An expression to be tested for truth, in lieu of (property)(operator)(value).

columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: An expression that indicates whether the test should be run.

columnDefinition.name: NameValueSeparator
columnDefinition.description: A single-character separator between name/value pairs.

columnDefinition.name: Index
columnDefinition.description: Indexer for multi-value properties, integer for multi-value properties and string for name/value pairs.
